pages.title: Banished Souls
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Banished Souls$() are used to further enhance idols by Hallowing the Idol, increasing the base durability by +3000 & Increasing the available Favour Chance by +5%

pages.title: Obtaining
pages.text: The only ways of obtaining $(#033dfc)Banished Souls$()is through Completing $(#033dfc)God Altars$() and opening $(#033dfc)Treasure Rooms$().
